item.title: Coup forecasts for 2017
item.description: Forecasts Models and accuracy Accuracy Data Covariates Coups Missing data Why did we not include…? Parting thoughts This posts provides some background for the coup forecasts article Mike Ward and I published in the Washington Posts’ Monkey Cage. Coup attempts, even if they fail, as the events in Turkey since July 2016 have shown, can have a major impact on a country. And, as some of the reactions to the Turkey coup attempt have reiterated, they often seem to come as a surprise.
